column2: "In the year 201306151707 of the Observable Universe Calendar
column3: ¥nDark Lord Dinner Ebitender of the Observable Universe Empire ¥ndevised a plan to annihilate the insufferable Rebel Army ¥nby constructing an overwhelmingly powerful ultimate weapon..."

column2: "He requested proposals for armaments from his totally reliable vendors..."
"And awaited reports from his totally genius middle managers..."
"The ultimate weapon construction project is about to begin..."
